name: God Save The King Vintage Flag Bolster Cushion Set
description:
"God Save the King"

Using a rare vintage God Save the King flag, in wonderful red white and blue, these three bolster cushions make a stylish statement and an enviable display! Backed in a neutral grey linen and finished with the classic Ragology label and vintage red buttons.

Each bolster measures approx 25cm x 80cm, filled with hollow fibre filling.

Dry Clean only

name: Fox & Tweed Recycled Vintage Fur Cushion
description:
A marvellous interpretation of a wonderful Great British scene - the running fox. Using British green tweed, a recyled piece of vintage fur and backed with a vintage Mulberry fabric - this cushion really is 100% British!

Mr Fox is appliqued onto the tweed using a red stitching to make him "pop" from the background.

Measuring 18"x18" (includes feather filled pad)

Dry Clean only!

Please note any fur used in Ragology's products is well and truly vintage - damaged coats etc, recycled as would otherwise be discarded.

name: Vintage Union Jack Flag With Tweed Cushion
description:
Tweed Tweed Tweed (Not of the Jack Variety!!) Here at Ragology, we just love Tweed - it screams Luxurious Great British Heritage.  It's Royal, it's preppy it's just plain Fabulous!!

Using a much loved vintage printed Union Jack usually from 1930s - 1950's, which has been restored back to it's Glory these cushions are so eye catching and and distinctive. Each cushion uses a different part of the flag, so each is unique, although all will have that Great Britishness oozing from them. To add the finishing touches two vintage buttons for fastening and a high quality feather pad.

Upcycling at it's best!

Measures 50cm x 50cm

name: Vintage Stitched Union Jack Cushion
description:
Ragology's original heirloom cushion. 

Using a much loved vintage stitched (not printed) Union Jack, which has been restored back to it's Glory these cushions are so eye catching and distinctive. Each cushion uses a different part of the flag, so each is unique, although all will have that Great Britishness oozing from them, with a wool/tweed backing (with green coloured base tones), two vintage buttons for fastening and a high quality feather pad.

Upcycling at it's best!

Measures 50cm x 50cm

name: Vintage Flag Old Glory Stars & Stripes Cushion
description:
Ragology's original heirloom cushion. 

Using a much loved vintage Old Glory flag, which has been restored back to it's "Glory" these cushions are so eye catching and and distinctive. Each cushion uses a different part of a different flag, so each is unique, although all will feature stars and stripes, with a natural linen or grey flannel (wool/cashmere blend) backing - please specify when placing order, two vintage buttons for fastening and a high quality feather pad.

Upcycling at it's best!

Measures 50cm x 50cm 

Please note that whilst I do my best to source 100% stitched flags, some cushions are made using stitched/printed vintage flags, however every cushions still oozes quality and uniqueness!
